description: Historical atmoshere only simulation with historical WMGHG, transient historical SSTs. Ozone depleting substances fixed at 1950 emission levels.
keywords: AerChemMIP, Tier 1, Historical perturbation, historical WMGHG, historical SST, 1950 HC, halocarbons, ozone depleting substances
long_name: historical SSTs and historical forcing, but with1950 halocarbon concentrations
rationale: Estimate ERFs through specified transient historical SST simulations.

requirements.description: Forcing data for concentration-driven historical CMIP6 runs. Here, we provide an outline of a consolidated set of atmospheric concentration time series for the long-lived greenhouse-gases, including CO2, CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, several ODS, and NF3 to serve as input for the CMIP6 Historical simulations.
requirements.keywords: Historical, Well Mixed Greenhouse Gas, WMGHG
requirements.label: Historical WMGHG Concentrations

requirements.description: Impose historical concentrations of Nitrous Oxide (N2O).
requirements.label: Historical N2O Concentrations

requirements.description: Impose transient historical emissions of near term climate forcers (NTCF): namely tropospheric aerosols, and tropospheric ozone precursors.
requirements.keywords: Historical, NTCF, near term climate forcers
requirements.label: Historical NTCF Emissions

requirements.description: Impose 1950 concentrations of Ozone Depleting Halocarbons, namely CFCs and HCFCs.
requirements.keywords: 1950, Halocarbons, Ozone Depleting Substances, ODS, HCFC, CFC
requirements.label: 1950 Ozone Depleating Halocarbon Concentrations

requirements.description: Historical transient sea surface temperature from AerChemMIP experiment hist-piNTCF.
requirements.label: Historical AerChemMIP hist-piNTCF SSTs

requirements.description: Apply the global gridded land-use forcing datasets to link historical land-use data and future projections.  This new generation of “land use harmonization” (LUH2) builds upon past work from CMIP5, and includes updated inputs, higher spatial resolution, more detailed land-use transitions, and the addition of important agricultural management layers.
requirements.label: Historical Land Use

requirements.description: Solar forcing of the Earth system consistent with historical observations.
requirements.keywords: Historical, Solar, Forcing, SSI, TSI, Proton Forcing, Electron Forcing
requirements.label: Historical Solar Forcing

requirements.description: Initialisation is branched from the Historical AerChem Simulation in 1950.  To provide continuity between simulations.
requirements.label: 1950HistoricalInitialisation

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model with a chemistry component that includes stratospheric chemistry
requirements.keywords: AOGCM, Chemistry, Stratospheric Chemistry, AOGCM-StratChem, Atmosphere-Ocean General Circulation Model
requirements.label: AOGCM-StratChem Configuration
